wikipedia_page.main:
Jon Gilbert is a freelance British journalist. 
Gilbert has worked for 5 News, London Today/Tonight and the national ITV News, as a relief newscaster on the ITV News at 5:30.

link_mentions.page: List of ITV News on air staff

response: * Jon Gilbert (bibliographer) (born 1972), English bibliophile, historian and bibliographer of Ian Fleming
